name: Bounce: Classic Journeys
description:
Remember playing Bounce on your old phone? It is now available on your ios devices and it is free!
Bounce Classic, which for years was driving you crazy and draining the battery of your old cellphone.

Enjoy 11 original levels and 9 new levels, collect all rings and beware of dangerous thorns. Stay in touch with your friends and beat their scores. Most popular Bounce game - now on your ios devices!

***************************************************
* Completely free game
* Endless updates
* Intuitive and easy controls
* Suitable for all age.
* Now try to get a higher score and share it with your friends!
* New levels update every week.
